com.bigdata.bop.engine

Class BlockingBufferWithStats<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.relation.accesspath.BlockingBuffer<E>
      • com.bigdata.bop.engine.BlockingBufferWithStats<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBlockingBuffer<E>, IBuffer<E>, IRunnableBuffer<E>

    public class BlockingBufferWithStats<E>
extends BlockingBuffer<E>
    Extended to use the BufferAnnotations to provision the BlockingBuffer and to track the BOpStats as chunks are added to the buffer.
    Version:
    $Id: BlockingBufferWithStats.java 3838 2010-10-22 19:45:33Z thompsonbry $
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(E e,
          long timeout,
          TimeUnit unit)
            throws InterruptedException
        Overridden to track BOpStats.unitsOut and BOpStats.chunksOut.

        Note: BOpStats.chunksOut will report the #of chunks added to this buffer. However, the buffer MAY combine chunks either on add() or when drained by the iterator so the actual #of chunks read back from the iterator MAY differ.

        Add element to the buffer.

        Overrides:
        add in class BlockingBuffer<E>
        Parameters:
        e - The element.
        timeout - The timeout.
        unit - The unit in which the timeout is expressed.
        Returns:
        true iff the element was added to the buffer ( false indicates that the timeout expired before the element could be added to the buffer).
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted
